services.name: Drain Cleaning
services.shortDescription: Fast, effective drain cleaning for sinks, tubs, and main lines.
services.longDescription: Slow or clogged drains disrupt your daily life. {{businessName}} uses professional-grade equipment to clear blockages quickly and effectively, from simple sink clogs to stubborn main line backups. We'll diagnose the cause and recommend solutions to prevent future problems.

meta.title: Drain Cleaning {{city}} | Clogged Drain Repair | {{businessName}}
meta.description: Professional drain cleaning in {{city}}. Clear clogs fast with {{businessName}}. Video inspection, hydro jetting available. Call {{phone}} for same-day service.

services.name: Leak Repair
services.shortDescription: Expert leak detection and repair for all types of plumbing.
services.longDescription: Even small leaks waste water and can cause serious damage over time. {{businessName}} uses advanced leak detection technology to find hidden leaks without unnecessary damage to your home. We repair all types of leaks, from dripping faucets to underground pipe leaks.

meta.title: Leak Repair {{city}} | Water Leak Detection & Repair | {{businessName}}
meta.description: Expert leak detection and repair in {{city}}. Hidden leaks, slab leaks, pipe leaks. {{businessName}} stops leaks fast. Call {{phone}}.

services.name: Water Heater Services
services.shortDescription: Water heater repair, replacement, and installation services.
services.longDescription: No hot water? {{businessName}} services all types of water heaters including traditional tank, tankless, and hybrid models. Whether you need a quick repair or a full replacement, our licensed plumbers will get your hot water flowing again.

meta.title: Water Heater Repair {{city}} | Tankless & Tank Installation | {{businessName}}
meta.description: Water heater repair and installation in {{city}}. Tank, tankless, hybrid models. {{businessName}} - same-day service available. Call {{phone}}.

services.name: Sewer Line Services
services.shortDescription: Sewer line repair, replacement, and cleaning services.
services.longDescription: Sewer problems require professional expertise. {{businessName}} offers comprehensive sewer services from camera inspections to full line replacement. We use trenchless technology when possible to minimize disruption to your property.

meta.title: Sewer Line Repair {{city}} | Trenchless Sewer Replacement | {{businessName}}
meta.description: Sewer line repair and replacement in {{city}}. Trenchless options, camera inspection. {{businessName}} - call {{phone}} for diagnosis.

services.name: Fixture Installation
services.shortDescription: Professional installation of faucets, toilets, sinks, and more.
services.longDescription: Upgrade your bathroom or kitchen with professional fixture installation from {{businessName}}. We install all types of plumbing fixtures including faucets, toilets, sinks, garbage disposals, and more. Proper installation ensures years of trouble-free use.

meta.title: Plumbing Fixture Installation {{city}} | Faucets, Toilets, Sinks | {{businessName}}
meta.description: Professional fixture installation in {{city}}. Faucets, toilets, sinks, disposals. {{businessName}} ensures leak-free installation. Call {{phone}}.

services.name: Whole-Home Repiping
services.shortDescription: Replace old, failing pipes with modern, reliable plumbing.
services.longDescription: If your home has galvanized, polybutylene, or aging copper pipes, repiping can prevent leaks, improve water pressure, and provide peace of mind. {{businessName}} replaces old pipes with modern PEX or copper, with minimal disruption to your home.

meta.title: Repiping Services {{city}} | Whole House Pipe Replacement | {{businessName}}
meta.description: Whole-home repiping in {{city}}. Replace old pipes with PEX or copper. {{businessName}} - free estimates. Call {{phone}}.

services.name: Emergency Plumbing
services.longDescription: Burst pipes, major leaks, and sewer backups can't wait. {{businessName}} offers 24/7 emergency plumbing service in {{city}}. Our plumbers are on call around the clock with fully stocked trucks, ready to respond to any plumbing emergency.

meta.title: 24/7 Emergency Plumber {{city}} | After-Hours Plumbing Service | {{businessName}}
meta.description: 24/7 emergency plumbing in {{city}}. Burst pipes, leaks, backups. {{businessName}} responds fast, day or night. Call {{phone}} now.
